results.title: Product Tester
results.description: Presently we're recruiting Product Testers (from home) in most of the United Kingdom regions to expand our private network of In-Home Usage Testers (IHUT) to fulfill upcoming contracts with multinational market research companies. We guarantee 15-20 hours per week with an hourly pay of between £14/hr. and £19/hr., depending on the In-Home Usage Test project. No experience required. UK Consumer Panels® is a consulting firm that specializes in product testing and product development work. We desi…
